comment: It is the same political party [CONservatives] that demanded we microchip our pets are now demanding we vaccinate ourselves. Mm!!
amr:
# ::snt It is the same political party [CONservatives] that demanded we microchip our pets are now demanding we vaccinate ourselves. Mm!!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / same-01
            :ARG1 (d / demand-01
                  :ARG0 (p / political-party

                  :ARG0-of (d2 / demand-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / microchip-01
                              :ARG0 (w / we)
                              :ARG1 (p2 / pet
                                    :poss w))))
            :ARG1 (m3 / microchip-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 p2))
      :ARG2 (d3 / demand-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (v / vaccinate-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 w)
            :time (n / now))
      :snt2 (h / hmm
            :mode expressive))
